Merge branch 'master' of github.com:sozialhelden/wheelmap-android

- shiny new MyLocationManager, handles network and wifi location and event notification
- new WheelmapApp class, starts MyLocationManager and triggers it once until result is sufficient
- all Location-dependent entities (list, mapsforge map) get their location from the new thingy
- syncservice and poisprovider get their location as request parameter

- changed pois ContentProvider from applyBatch to bulkInsert
- is not - yet - actually faster, but does less notifying and therefore a ANR-Problem in listview does not occur
- reworked poiprovider to be blazingly fast, lol ;-).
editing of POI is posible and data are stored into DB
- changed behaviour - network location superseedes gps location if gps location is older than gps update time
